{%- from "templates/print_formats/standard_macros.html" import add_header -%} {%- if not doc.get("print_heading") and not doc.get("select_print_heading") and doc.set("select_print_heading", _("Purchase Invoice")) -%}{%- endif -%} {{ add_header(0, 1, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead, print_settings) }}
